bill.title: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion
bill.description: Amend The South Carolina Code Of Laws By Enacting The "ending Illegal Discrimination And Restoring Merit-based Opportunity Act" By Adding Article 29 To Title 1, Chapter 1 So As To Prohibit Every Office, Division, Or Other Unit By Any Name Of Every Office Or Department Of This State, And All Of Its Political Subdivisions, Including All Institutions Of Higher Learning And School Districts, From Promoting Diversity, Equity, And Inclusion, And To Provide Exceptions; And To Promote Individual Initiative, Excellence, And Hard Work; And To Specify Applicability.

history.action: Referred to Committee on Education and Public Works
Member(s) request name added as sponsor: Terribile, Pace, Kilmartin, Beach, Edgerton, Magnuson, Cromer, Huff
Member(s) request name added as sponsor: Gilreath
Committee report: Favorable with amendment Education and Public Works
Member(s) request name removed as sponsor: Calhoon
Read third time and sent to Senate

votes.desc: House: Table Motion To Recommit Bill

calendar.description: House Full Education and Public Works Committee
